hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that paying a #fee to the Gerudos# grants access to #the Deku Tree#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Red Rupee#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that ##Dodongo's Cavern## has #6# major items.

DMT (Biggoron).text: Dear @, please come to the castle. I've baked a cake for you.&Yours truly, princess Zelda.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #the Fire Temple# is on the path to #the Key#.
hinted_locations: Fire Temple Boulder Maze Upper Chest

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that plundering #outside Ganon's Castle# is a foolish choice.

GC (Maze).text: They say that #the Market# is on the way of the hero.
hinted_locations: Market Treasure Chest Game Room 3 Bottom

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Bombchus (10 pieces)#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that #stalfos in the Shadow Temple# guard #a Bomb Bag#.
hinted_locations: Shadow Temple MQ Stalfos Room Chest

HC (Malon).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# rewards both...^ #a Heart Container# and #a Recovery Heart#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Fire Temple Small Key#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that upon the #Colossus's right and left hands# lie...^ #a Piece of Heart# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Bombchus (10 pieces)#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #a Piece of Heart#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that #a Gold Skulltula Token# can be found inside #the Temple of Time#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that #Bombchus (20 pieces)# can be found at #Gerudo Valley#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that an #invisible spinning blade# in the Shadow Temple guards...^ #Arrows (10 pieces)# and #a Hylian Shield#.
hinted_locations: Shadow Temple MQ Invisible Blades Visible Chest
Shadow Temple MQ Invisible Blades Invisible Chest

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that #Goron City# is on the way of the hero.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #the Gerudo Training Ground# is on the path to #Twinrova#.
hinted_locations: Gerudo Training Ground Maze Path Third Chest

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that the #Light Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

LH (Lab).text: They say that #riding the bean in Lake Hylia# leads to...^ #a Blue Rupee# and #a Water Temple Small Key#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that #Zora's River# is on the path of time.
hinted_locations: ZR Near Open Grotto Freestanding PoH

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Wallet#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that looking into darkness may find darkness looking back into you.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that the final prize of #the thieves' training# is #the Requiem of Spirit#.
hinted_locations: Gerudo Training Ground Maze Path Final Chest

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that the #Water Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Wallet#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that plundering #Gerudo's Fortress# is a foolish choice.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that #the Fire Temple# hoards #a Gerudo Training Ground Small Key#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that the #Shadow Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that deep #under a vast lake#, one can find #Dodongo's Cavern#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Fire Temple Small Key#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that #a Heart Container# can be found in #the Death Mountain Crater#.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Red Rupee#.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that #a Fire Temple Small Key# can be found in #Kokiri Forest#.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that ##the Graveyard## has #3# major items.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Forest Temple Small Key# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.
